languages.text: The Drukhari gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and +1 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for each creature suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects in a 5-cell radius.
languages.original_text: Друкари получают +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, + 3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} и +1 временное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} за каждое существо с эффектом {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g} в радиусе 5 клеток.

traits.locale_text: The Drukhari gain +3 Strength, +3 Willpower, and +1 temporary wound for each creature suffering burning, bleeding, stunned, or poisoned effects in a 5-cell radius.

The Drukhari gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and +1 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for each creature suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects in a 5-cell radius.

The Drukhari gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and +1 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for each creature suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects in a 5-cell radius.

languages.text: Друкари получают +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, + 3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} и +1 временное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} за каждое существо с эффектом {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g} в радиусе 5 клеток.

traits.locale_text: Друкари получают +3 к Силе, + 3 Силе Воли и +1 к временному здоровью за каждое существо с эффектом Горения, Кровотечения, Шока или Отравления в радиусе 5 клеток.

languages.text: Die Drukhari erhalten +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und +1 temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunde{/g} für jede Kreatur in einem Radius von 5 Feldern, die mit einem der folgenden Effekte belegt ist: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and +1 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for each creature suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects in a 5-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Die Drukhari erlangen +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, und +1 temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunde{/g} für jede Kreatur in einem 5-Felder-Radius, die einen der folgenden Effekte erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g} oder Vergiftet.

languages.text: Les Drukharis obtiennent +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} et +1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessure{/g} temporaire pour chaque créature frappée par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} dans un rayon de 5 cases.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and +1 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for each creature suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects in a 5-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Les Drukhari reçoivent +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} et +1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessure{/g} temporaire pour chaque créature frappée par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} ou Empoisonnement dans un rayon de 5 cases.

languages.text: 5格内，每当有任何生物陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或毒素状态，黑暗灵族就会获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、+3{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与+1临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Drukhari gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and +1 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for each creature suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or toxin effects in a 5-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: 5格内，每当有任何生物陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或中毒状态，黑暗灵族就会获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、+3{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与+1临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。

languages.text: Los Drukhari ganan +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y +1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}herida{/g} temporal por cada criatura afectada por los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdimiento{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} en un radio de 5 casillas.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and +1 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for each creature suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects in a 5-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Los Drukhari ganan +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y +1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}herida{/g} temporal por cada criatura afectada por los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdimiento{/g} o toxina en un radio de 5 casillas.

languages.text: デュカーリは、半径5セル以内で{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}、または{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}性効果を被ったそれぞれの生物に対して、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g} +3、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g} +3、そして一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g} +1を獲得する。
languages.original_text: The Drukhari gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and +1 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for each creature suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects in a 5-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: デュカーリは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g} +3、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g} +3を獲得し、そして半径5セル以内の{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}呆然{/g}を受けた生物に対して現時点の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g} +1を与える。

languages.text: Drukhari; 5 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} etkisinden muzdarip her yaratık için +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}, +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} ve +1 geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and +1 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for each creature suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects in a 5-cell radius.
